name: Ceng Ceng Bali VR
description:
Playing traditional music(Bali Music Instrumental) must be fun and feel excited. But have you ever feel playing traditional music in virtual reality (VR)? Introducing our games "Ceng Ceng Bali Bali VR" from our studio Rapid Raid Games that gives an experience playing Bali traditional music in VR.

In Ceng Ceng Bali VR you will provided our video and tutorial about how to play for beginner. feel free to create your own traditional song or you can learn a Ceng-Ceng song from it!

Support Devices Oculus Rift/S
